rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible with a ramp and handrails leading to all rooms.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Eco-friendly design featuring energy-efficient appliances, natural light, open layout for interaction. Vastu principles considered with north-east oriented dining area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Eco-friendly master suite with integrated wardrobe and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second bedroom designed for privacy, incorporating wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with natural lighting and energy efficient design.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space, soundproofing, eco-friendly insulation, and wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Home theater with eco-friendly acoustic panels, LED lighting and energy-saving features. Designed in accordance with Vastu to enhance sound distribution.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest bathroom, eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.features: Ramped entrance for wheelchair accessibility; energy-efficient automatic doors.
Triple-glazed windows for thermal insulation and natural light optimization, following Vastu guidelines.

locations.name: From Home Office to Guest Bathroom

openings.features: Wide doors (36 inches) for wheelchair accessibility, eco-friendly construction materials.
